channel.title: It's a Wonderful and Magical Life! [Character Sheet]
channel.description:
Put all character sheet here. **A like from me or Shurian means that the character is accepted**
### Do not post anything other than character sheet here. Discussion of character sheet should be restricted to OOC Thread or Discord Server (To be added)
[details=Character Sheet Example] #### Personal Information **Name/Aliases**: Minky Momo **Age**: 13 **Gender**: Female **Appearance**: Pretty short, with bubbly brown hair that puffs up. Typically seen wearing a blue bandana in a futile effort to keep her hair in order. **Background**: A girl adopted by a pair of childless parent. Tries her best to fulfill the dream of her parents.
#### Magical Girl Information **Magical Girl Name**: Magical Princess Pinky Momo **Artefact**: Star hairpin **Transformation Sequence**: Pipiluma pipiluma puririmpa papaleho papaleho dolilimpa! **Magic Power**: Occupation Woman Momo is able to turn into adult woman with specific profession. **Appearance**: [![](https://www.bleedingcool.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/cdf61289066c4829a07621d8ca4aafc5-171x350.jpg)](https://www.bleedingcool.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/02/cdf61289066c4829a07621d8ca4aafc5-171x350.jpg) [/details] #### Personal Information **Name/Aliases**: **Age**: **Gender**: Female **Appearance**: (Description or Picture. Description preferred) **Background**: (Short description of your character. At least a solid paragraph)
#### Magical Girl Information **Magical Girl Name**: (The name of your magical girl persona!) **Artefact**: (What item turn you into a magical girl? Bracelet? Ring?) **Transformation Sequence**: (The line that you say as you turn into a magical girl. *You must have this*) **Magic Power**: (What is the theme of your magic? Bubble? Catgirl?) **Appearance**:(Description or Picture. Picture preferred)

item.title: It's a Wonderful and Magical Life! [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Nerbins
item.description:
Name: Derrick “Douche” Daniels
Age: 17
Gender: Male
Background: Asshole. Tends to get on everyone’s nerves, and can never find a person that is not worth picking on. Surprisingly quite smart. (Possibly Whammerist. /s)
Appearance: Tall, with black hair that looks completely normal. Usually has some kind of mark on his knuckles. Isn’t seen much at school.

(I’m bored.)
Magical Girl Information: Nope.

Read full topic
item.source: It's a Wonderful and Magical Life! [Character Sheet]

item.title: It's a Wonderful and Magical Life! [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
Name/Aliases: Ayano Aishi

Age: 15

Gender: Female

Background: She was the new student to the school, apparently a very anti-social girl. However, she is quite intelligent.

Appearance:

Magical girl information

Magical Girl Name: Dawning Light

Artifact: A wand.

Transformation: I will use my light to cure your spirit!

Magical power: She can control the power of light to her own will.

Appearance:

(Rito don’t sue me)

Read full topic
item.source: It's a Wonderful and Magical Life! [Character Sheet]

item.title: It's a Wonderful and Magical Life! [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: PolikShadowbliss
item.description:
Personal Information

Name/Aliases: Betty White
Age: 16
Gender: Female
Appearance: short blonde hair, green eyes, a long, pointy face with freckles.
Background: Shy and reserved, she often goes unnoticed and disappears often. Her background is pretty generic, she was born to wealthy parents and pretty much has a normal life, she eats, sleeps, goes to school, etc, etc. Pretty freaking normal and bland. That was until she became a magical girl.

Magical Girl Information

Magical Girl Name: Misty
Artefact: A locket
Transformation Sequence: Keezam
Magic Power: Fire and flame as well as invisibility and healing. (couldn’t decide so I just clumped it all in)
Appearance: Her clothes and attire are not as flashy as a normal Magical Girl’s, as a matter of fact. She is actually very conesertive in the way she dresses.

Read full topic
item.source: It's a Wonderful and Magical Life! [Character Sheet]

item.title: It's a Wonderful and Magical Life! [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Personal Information

Name/Aliases: Juno Terra
Age: 16
Gender: Female
Appearance: long black twintail hair. Short height. Blue eyes. Basically her magical girl form except with different hair and eye color.
Background: Juno has never been shy but she never was good at interacting with others either. She tended to come off as too forceful and rude when speaking to others without ever meaning to. This lead her to gain a bit of a loner complex pushing her to do everything herself even when it only gets herself hurt. She’s cleaver and can get things done most of the time. But when she can’t she has a hard time asking for help.

Magical Girl Information

Magical Girl Name: Choten
Artefact: A metal extendable ninja staff. Extending it is part of triggering the transformation sequence but can be used without transforming (in which case it has no magical property’s)
Transformation Sequence: “I am maverick, I am apex, the power to succeed flows through me.”
Magic Power: Electricity Manipulation
Appearance:

Read full topic
item.source: It's a Wonderful and Magical Life! [Character Sheet]

item.title: It's a Wonderful and Magical Life! [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: SoulShard
item.description:
Name/Aliases: Lucy Dawnstar
Age: 16
Gender: Female
Background: Lucy is apart of a rich family and she is the heir however she was born with a condition that has left her Physically blind. her parents have chosen to abandon tradition and give there inheritance to her little brother when he has come of age.
Appearance:

Magical Girl Information

Magical Girl Name: Spirit Keeper
Artifact: a pocket watch that counts down to her death
Transformation Sequence: in blackest night, in darkest day. death will find thy way, to break chains of my soul
Magic Power: Death And spirits
Appearance:

Read full topic
item.source: It's a Wonderful and Magical Life! [Character Sheet]

item.title: It's a Wonderful and Magical Life! [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: CheesyKnives
item.description:
(Y’all gonna make me regret thisss)

Personal Information

Name/Aliases: Yoko Kanai
Age: 14
Gender: Female
Appearance:
Background: Helps run the schools gardening club, and has an avid passion for plants. Tends to get frustrated easily when she feels something is wrong. (At least a solid paragraph my ass :^)) Otherwise a very bubbly and kind person that is friends with a lot of people.

Magical Girl Information

Magical Girl Name: Vitaterra
Artefact: Wreath
Transformation Sequence: And so all the essence of the earth shall course through me now!
Magic Power: Nature
Appearance:

Read full topic
item.source: It's a Wonderful and Magical Life! [Character Sheet]

item.title: It's a Wonderful and Magical Life! [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: PoisonedSquid
item.description:
Name/Aliases: Aoi Yodogawa
Age: 14
Gender: Female
Appearance:

Background: An up and coming member of the school swim team. Feels out of place in the world, but always tries her best. Confident, yet stubborn when faced with a difficult task.

Magical Girl Information

Magical Girl Name: Majestic Ocean
Artifact: Umbrella
Transformation Sequence: Let the waves consume you!
Magic Power: Water
Appearance:

Background: Mystical and gentle. Knows how to put up a fight.

Read full topic
item.source: It's a Wonderful and Magical Life! [Character Sheet]

item.title: It's a Wonderful and Magical Life! [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Whammerist
item.description:
Personal Information

Name/Aliases: Mio Katsura
Age: 14
Gender: Female
Appearance:
Background: Intelligent and quiet, quite softspoken. Cares greatly for her friends and classmates, yet isn’t always the best at showing it.

Magical Girl Information

Magical Girl Name: Magical Showstopper Mio Katsura
Artifact: Magical Ribbon
Transformation Sequence: Lights, camera, action! The stage is set, and it’s time for a new me to shine! I am the Magical Showstopper, Mio Katsura, and I will take out the evildoers before the curtains close!
(how the fuck do I do these lel)
Magic Power: Illusions / light
Appearance:
Background: A confident leader, breaking out of her shell!

Read full topic
item.source: It's a Wonderful and Magical Life! [Character Sheet]

item.title: It's a Wonderful and Magical Life! [Character Sheet]
item.dc:creator: Jazz
item.description:
Personal Information

Name/Aliases: Katie Silverman
Age: 16
Gender: Female
Appearance:

Background: Katie is a music student, with a passion for playing instruments and creating “sick jams”, she dreams of being in a band, or maybe being a DJ, despite her love for all things sound-related, she doesn’t talk much.

Magical Girl Information

Magical Girl Name: Emcee
Artifact: Necklace, because not everything can be sound related that’s just ridiculous.
Transformation Sequence: Let’s mix things up!
Magic Power: Sound Manipulation, Emcee is able to not only create any sound, but she can also create weaponised sound blasts
Appearance:

(this but with headphones)

Read full topic

item.description:
Put all character sheet here. A like from me or Shurian means that the character is accepted

Do not post anything other than character sheet here.

Discussion of character sheet should be restricted to OOC Thread or Discord Server (To be added)

Character Sheet Example

Personal Information

Name/Aliases: Minky Momo
Age: 13
Gender: Female
Appearance: Pretty short, with bubbly brown hair that puffs up. Typically seen wearing a blue bandana in a futile effort to keep her hair in order.
Background: A girl adopted by a pair of childless parent. Tries her best to fulfill the dream of her parents.

Magical Girl Information

Magical Girl Name: Magical Princess Pinky Momo
Artefact: Star hairpin
Transformation Sequence: Pipiluma pipiluma puririmpa papaleho papaleho dolilimpa!
Magic Power: Occupation Woman
Momo is able to turn into adult woman with specific profession.
Appearance: 

#### Personal Information
**Name/Aliases**:
**Age**:
**Gender**: Female
**Appearance**: (Description or Picture. Description preferred)
**Background**: (Short description of your character. At least a solid paragraph)

#### Magical Girl Information
**Magical Girl Name**: (The name of your magical girl persona!)
**Artefact**: (What item turn you into a magical girl? Bracelet? Ring?)
**Transformation Sequence**: (The line that you say as you turn into a magical girl. *You must have this*)
**Magic Power**: (What is the theme of your magic? Bubble? Catgirl?)
**Appearance**:(Description or Picture. Picture preferred)
